definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 jie1 shou1 ji1

sentences.english: Design and stimulation of the OEIC receivers.
sentences.chinese: OEIC光接收机的设计和模拟。

sentences.english: C-band pulse Doppler weather radar receiver is described in detail in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种C波段脉冲多普勒天气雷达接收机。

sentences.english: Receivers must be as noise-free as possible.
sentences.chinese: 接收机必须尽量做到无噪声。

sentences.english: Transmission system, receiving device, transmitter and interface device.
sentences.chinese: 传输系统，接收机，发送机和接口设备。

sentences.english: Noise figure is crucial for multi-channel RF receiver.
sentences.chinese: 噪声系数是多通道射频接收机的一个重要参数。

sentences.english: Both an RF power analyzer and a spectrum analyzer are essentially specialized superheterodyne receivers.
sentences.chinese: 功率分析仪和频谱分析仪都本质上都是超外差接收机。

sentences.english: The segment of a satellite transmission from the satellite to an earth station or receiving antenna(dish).
sentences.chinese: 卫星向地面卫星接收机站或天线传输的信号。

sentences.english: The design of the GPS receiver is derived from a pre-research project.
sentences.chinese: 本接收机的研制来源于一个预研课题。

sentences.english: A monolithically integrated optoelectronic receiver is presented.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种单片集成的光电接收机芯片。

sentences.english: The receiver is composed of M correlators and one decision device.
sentences.chinese: 该接收机由M个相关器和一个判决器组成。

sentences.english: A kind of generalized likelihood ratio(GLR)receiver is proposed for multiple signals detection.
sentences.chinese: 提出并设计了一类通用的多重信号广义似然接收机。

sentences.english: The oscillator has been used as second local oscillator of the satelite broadcast televisor.
sentences.chinese: 该振荡器已用作卫星直播电视接收机的第二本振源。

sentences.english: Corresponding to transmitter, receiver uses two down-conversions structure.
sentences.chinese: 与发射机相对应，接收机采用二次下变频的结构。

sentences.english: Turn the power switch to the ON position on the DSSS Receiver.
sentences.chinese: 打开电源开关的问题上的立场扩频接收机。

sentences.english: TV monitor has no tuner and is not capable of receiving off-air or CATV signals without additional equipment.
sentences.chinese: 因其没有接收机，所以无法收看一般电视节目。

sentences.english: The anti-multiple-access-interference receiver proposed in the thesis adapt to forward access channel communication.
sentences.chinese: 这种多址干扰抑制接收机适用于前向通信。

pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 jie1 shou1 ji1
